MAIN_PAGE.DESCRIPTION: This application is only supported in mobile view at the moment.

CUSTOMERS_PAGE.TITLE: Customer
CUSTOMERS_PAGE.DESCRIPTION: This is where customer information can be managed.

DELETE_CUSTOMER_DIALOG.TITLE: Delete customer
DELETE_CUSTOMER_DIALOG.CONFIRM: Are you sure to delete selected customer?
DELETE_CUSTOMER_DIALOG.SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Selected customer has been successfully removed.
DELETE_CUSTOMER_DIALOG.ERROR_MESSAGE: Removing customer failed. Please again later.

BARANGAYS_PAGE.TITLE: Barangays
BARANGAYS_PAGE.DESCRIPTION: This is where barangays information can be managed.

DELETE_BARANGAY_DIALOG.TITLE: Delete barangay
DELETE_BARANGAY_DIALOG.CONFIRM: Are you sure to delete selected barangay?
DELETE_BARANGAY_DIALOG.SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Selected barangay has been successfully removed.
DELETE_BARANGAY_DIALOG.ERROR_MESSAGE: Removing barangay failed. Please again later.

ADD_BARANGAY_DIALOG.TITLE: Add Barangay
ADD_BARANGAY_DIALOG.CONFIRM: Are you sure to add new barangay?
ADD_BARANGAY_DIALOG.SUCCESS_MESSAGE: New barangay has been successfully added!
ADD_BARANGAY_DIALOG.ERROR_MESSAGE: Adding new barangay failed. Please again later.

UPDATE_BARANGAY_DIALOG.TITLE: Update Barangay
UPDATE_BARANGAY_DIALOG.CONFIRM: Are you sure to update barangay?
UPDATE_BARANGAY_DIALOG.SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Selected barangay has been successfully updated!
UPDATE_BARANGAY_DIALOG.ERROR_MESSAGE: Updating barangay failed. Please again later.

EDIT_CUSTOMER_DIALOG.TITLE: Update customer
EDIT_CUSTOMER_DIALOG.CONFIRM: Are you sure to save customer details?
EDIT_CUSTOMER_DIALOG.ERROR_MESSAGE: Updating customer failed. Please again later.

SAVE_NEW_CUSTOMER_DIALOG.TITLE: Save new customer
SAVE_NEW_CUSTOMER_DIALOG.CONFIRM: Are you sure to save new customer details?
SAVE_NEW_CUSTOMER_DIALOG.ERROR_MESSAGE: Saving new customer failed. Please again later.

SAVE_NEW_CONFIRMED_ORDER_DIALOG.TITLE: Save new order
SAVE_NEW_CONFIRMED_ORDER_DIALOG.CONFIRM: Are you sure to save new order?
SAVE_NEW_CONFIRMED_ORDER_DIALOG.ERROR_MESSAGE: Saving order failed. Please again later.

SAVE_NEW_DRAFT_ORDER_DIALOG.TITLE: Save as draft order
SAVE_NEW_DRAFT_ORDER_DIALOG.CONFIRM: Are you sure to save new draft order?
SAVE_NEW_DRAFT_ORDER_DIALOG.SUCCESS_MESSAGE: New draft order has been saved!
SAVE_NEW_DRAFT_ORDER_DIALOG.ERROR_MESSAGE: Saving draft order failed. Please again later.

CLEAR_ORDER_DIALOG.TITLE: Clear order
CLEAR_ORDER_DIALOG.CONFIRM: Are you sure to save clear order?

INSUFFICIENT_PRODUCT_QUANTITY_DIALOG.MESSAGE: Following Items have insufficient stocks available: </br></br>

CODE_CONTROL.LABEL: Code
CODE_CONTROL.ALREADY_EXIST_ERROR_MESSAGE: Code already exists. Please enter a different code

SAVE_NEW_PRODUCT_DIALOG.TITLE: Save new product
SAVE_NEW_PRODUCT_DIALOG.CONFIRM: Are you sure to save new prouct details?
SAVE_NEW_PRODUCT_DIALOG.ERROR_MESSAGE: Saving new product failed. Please again later.

CODE_CONTROL.LABEL: Code
CODE_CONTROL.ALREADY_EXIST_ERROR_MESSAGE: Code already exists. Please enter a different code

EDIT_PRODUCT_DIALOG.TITLE: Update product
EDIT_PRODUCT_DIALOG.CONFIRM: Are you sure to save product details?
EDIT_PRODUCT_DIALOG.ERROR_MESSAGE: Updating product failed. Please again later.

PRODUCTS_CATALOGUE_PAGE.TITLE: Product Catalogue
PRODUCTS_CATALOGUE_PAGE.DESCRIPTION: This is where product information is being managed. User can choose items and add them to cart.

DELETE_PRODUCT_DIALOG.TITLE: Delete product
DELETE_PRODUCT_DIALOG.CONFIRM: Are you sure to delete selected product?
DELETE_PRODUCT_DIALOG.SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Selected product has been successfully removed.
DELETE_PRODUCT_DIALOG.ERROR_MESSAGE: Removing product failed. Please again later.

TRANSACTION_HISTORY_PAGE.TITLE: Transactions
TRANSACTION_HISTORY_PAGE.DESCRIPTION: This shows the list of dates where there are transactions recorded.

DRAFT_TRANSACTIONS_PAGE.TITLE: Draft Transactions
DRAFT_TRANSACTIONS_PAGE.DESCRIPTION: This shows available dates that have draft transactions.

TRANSACTION_PAGE.TITLE: Transactions
TRANSACTION_PAGE.DESCRIPTION: This shows the list of customers that have transactions for the selected date.

MARK_TRANSACTION_AS_PAID_DIALOG.TITLE: Mark as Paid
MARK_TRANSACTION_AS_PAID_DIALOG.CONFIRM: Are you sure to mark this transaction as paid?
MARK_TRANSACTION_AS_PAID_DIALOG.SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Selected transaction is now marked as paid.
MARK_TRANSACTION_AS_PAID_DIALOG.ERROR_MESSAGE: Marking the transaction as paid failed. Please try again later.

TOP_PRODUCTS_PAGE.TITLE: Top Products
TOP_PRODUCTS_PAGE.DESCRIPTION: This shows statistics of the most frequently transacted products.

SALES_PAGE.TITLE: Sales
SALES_PAGE.DESCRIPTION: This shows the amount of sales that the system recorded based on the date filter.
